sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router' import { getUserByID } from './utils' import {styles} from './styles.css' export default function User8_2() { const params = useParams()//params ---> id from path='/:id' const [user,setUser] = useState({})// Determine stste--->user(now its empty), because i need get name,email,street and city of linked user. useEffect (async () => { const selectedUser = await getUserByID(params.id);//from utils; selectedUser-its user name wich was chosen in Users page. setUser(selectedUser.data)//user from state = selectedUser },[]) return(

{user.username}

Name:{user.name}
Email:{user.email}
Street:{user.street}
City:{user.city}
) }
